tooltip.nuclearcraft.water_collector: %s mB every 2 sec. Put this item inside the Pump(Nuclearcraft). You can Upgrade the speed and energy.
tooltip.allthemodium.upgrade: Find me inside ancient city chests. 2.5% Chance
tooltip.kubejs.texture_credit: Texture is from %s. Thank you a lot!
tooltip.mm.energy_port: Energy Capacity: %s FE, Max Input: %s FE/t, Max Output: %s FE/t
tooltip.mm.energy_port_gigantic: Energy Capacity/ Max In- and Output: %s FE
tooltip.mm.controller_refund: You will get the Philosopher Stone and the Master Infusion Crystal back. They dont get consumed.
tooltip.compactmachines.warning: The Compact Machine Blocks are huge! They can crash your game when entering them. Be careful! You can hold shift and see the internal size.
tooltip.avaritia.neutron: Build a Neutron Collector. Good Luck!
tooltip.mekanism_extras.naquadah: Find me in the End near the void or the End Mining Dimension -30 to -60 Y-Level. Very Rare
tooltip.mbtool.usage_1: Shift + Right Click to open the GUI.
tooltip.mbtool.usage_2: Shift + Mousewheel to rotate the Multiblock preview.
tooltip.armorplus.lava_crystal: Throw me in Lava to get Infused Lava Crystal
tooltip.armorplus.frost_crystal_1: Throw me on the ground and use "Engraved Thunder" or "Lightning Knife" (1 time use) to get Infused Frost Crystal
tooltip.armorplus.frost_crystal_2: Or throw a Trident at a mob with channeling while a thunderstorm is occurring. Or use the Mechanical Empowerer
tooltip.kubejs.ore_mining_dim: Find me inside the Mining Dimension
tooltip.born_in_chaos.chaos_component: Brewing/ Potion Station --> 1 Seed of Chaos and 3 Water Bottle + a blaze powder
tooltip.occultism.iesnium: Find me inside the Nether Mining Dimension. Y-Level 0-50
tooltip.born_in_chaos.pumpkinhead: Search a Infernal Evil Pumpkin and right click it with a Transmutation Elixir to spawn Lord Pumpkinhead
tooltip.credit.recipe_added: Recipe added by %s. Thanks a lot!
tooltip.credit.joke: Thanks a lot! Dont hate me, hate him :)
